evidence.claim: Medical Practice Success utilizes AWS for cloud services including Lambda and S3 for data processing and storage.
The company states that it is HIPAA compliant, ensuring the protection of health information across its services.
MPSRcm discusses its support for X12 transaction sets in the claims submission process, ensuring interoperability with payers.
The integration of FHIR standards is mentioned for data exchange between healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: Has capabilities in X12 EDI transactions for claims and eligibility.
